description.ko: 빛의 물리학을 탐구하는 작품으로, 단일한 백색광이 기하학적인 유리 프리즘을 통해 선명한 색의 스펙트럼으로 분산되는 찰나의 순간을 포착했습니다.
description.en: An exploration of the physics of light, capturing the precise moment a single white beam disperses into a vibrant spectrum of color through a geometric glass prism.

prompt: Cinematic macro photography of a crystalline prism refracting a sharp beam of light into a vivid, multi-layered rainbow spectrum. Intricate caustic patterns dancing on a minimalist white surface, chromatic aberration, ray tracing, high-speed photography style, 8k resolution, hyper-realistic glass textures, ethereal and clean aesthetic.
